amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available by this Act may be used to implement or enforce section 120, 425, 426, or 427.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 468).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Beyer amendment (A084) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 468).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A084) offered by Mr. Beyer.
